data.name: Various_DeleteWarning
data.value:
You are about to remove all data from matches that were previously entered. This data contains the set scores, the players, and everything that is entered manually. You can continue to use the program as before, but if you open a match day where results have already been entered, they will now be empty again.
Are you sure you want to delete this data?

data.name: Wizard_ServerErrors
data.value: The server returned the following errors:

data.name: Wizard_UpdateDesc
data.value: Use this window to update the database of the application.

data.name: Wizard_UpdateFileHelp
data.value:
To update the database through an update file, you must of course first have an update file. You must create this file on another computer that does have an internet connection.
Start the ScoreSheet program on the computer with internet connection and update the database using the 'Update database via the Internet' option. Once this is done, you can export that updated data to an update file by clicking on 'Options', 'Database updates' in the menu, and then on 'Save update file'. Give this update file a name and write it on a USB stick or portable hard drive.
After the file has been saved, you can then attach the USB stick or portable hard drive to this computer, and you can update the data on this computer using the 'Update database with an update file' option.

data.name: Wizard_UploadDesc
data.value: Use this window to upload data to the competition website.

data.name: Wizard_UploadMessage
data.value: You can upload the data of multiple matches in one go to the competition website. If you do not want to upload the data of certain matches, you can deselect them.

data.name: Wizard_UploadSuccessful
data.value: The data has been successfully uploaded!

data.name: Wizard_ValidationWarning
data.value: You have selected matches with validation errors. Are you sure you want to continue?
